# Essay on Shinylive

## What is Shinylive?

Shinylive is a new serverless framework that allows you to run Shiny apps **entirely in the browser**â€”no R server required.

## Key Differences from Traditional Shiny

| Shiny (Traditional) | Shinylive |
|---------------------|-----------|
| Requires R server   | Runs in browser |
| More powerful       | Lightweight |
| Server cost         | Free to host on static sites |

## Pros and Cons

**Pros:**
- No backend required
- Runs on GitHub Pages
- Fast to deploy

**Cons:**
- Limited interactivity (no file uploads, persistent memory)
- Only for small/medium apps
